page.title: 13ILLNESS AROUND TYWARDREATH
page.content: If you break a bone you can be X-rayed at{St. Austell Hospital,}which is 5 miles from here, but if it is broken you would have to travel to{Truro City {Hospital}19 miles away. You often have to wait quite a while to be treated as there are lots of people there from all over Cornwall. It is even{busier {in the summer when there are visitors} around who may have been sunburnt or had an accident. Also at Truro is the{District General} called{Treliske}where you would go for an operation or treatment. When you go home, a{District Nurse}will visit you on her rounds to look after you. She also dresses wounds, baths old people and talks to them and helps mums before and after they have their babies.
